text: Some digging shows that the <http://wine.com|wine.com> api is the one that support this new app <http://www.hellovino.com/>

attachments.title: Hello Vino - Wine Assistant App
attachments.text: Hello Vino is your wine shopping assistant - a FREE mobile app that gives you wine recommendations based on your personal taste preferences. NO SNOBS ALLOWED!
attachments.fallback: Hello Vino: Hello Vino - Wine Assistant App

text: None of their search results show the wine label
Yeah search experience leaves a lot to be desired. Whole thing does really, but interesting to note that there is a separate API that can find bottles by label and is publicly available.
Good find, it warrants some investigation
